'''1.21.10''' is a minor update to {{el|ee}}, released on April 23, 2025,<ref>{{cite|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/23323615654164-What-s-New-in-the-Cloud-Update-v1-21-05|title=What's New in the Cloud Update (v1.21.10)|website=Minecraft Education Support}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.

== Fixes ==

* MacOS Login and client freeze fix
* Coding stability improvements
* Other bug fixes
* Further general stability improvements.

== Feature removal ==
This version removes the option to disable "Only Allow Trusted Skins".
